Instruction: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C). Grease two baking sheets.
Beat egg whites with sugar, salt, and orange juice until mixture is thick and stiff peaks form. Drop spoonfuls of mixture onto greased baking sheets.

Bake for 20 to 30 minutes, or until the edges are light brown all around. Handle them with care as they are delicate. Let them cool on the baking sheet before transferring to a serving platter for your feast with your lively Portuguese family.
